Introduction

Jay, formerly known as Jinhwan, is a singer, lyricist, composer, and musical actor under 143 Entertainment. He is best known for being the leader, main vocalist and lead dancer of the boy group iKON.

He joined YG Entertainment in 2011 and later participated in the survival show "W.I.N: Who is Next" where he was a member of the Team B. In 2014, he was confirmed as a member of iKON. He then participated as one of three leaders on the survival show "Mix&Match" where he helped choose the rest iKON's members. He debuted as a member of iKON on September 15, 2015, and as a solo artist with the LP "BLUE MOON" in 2023.
